com.mca.assemblyline.components

Interface Component

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Engine, Frame, Seat, Tire

    public interface Component
    This interface provides the implementation for the construction of each component

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildComponent()
      Builds a component based on the time specification given Will use Thread.sleep() to simulate the time for building a component
      java.lang.String getComponentBuilt()
      Returns the name of the component that has been built
      boolean isComponentBuilt()
      Checks whether a component has been completed or not

    • Method Detail

      • buildComponent

        Builds a component based on the time specification given Will use Thread.sleep() to simulate the time for building a component

        Checks whether a component has been completed or not
        Returns:
        true if a component is completed

      • getComponentBuilt

        java.lang.String getComponentBuilt()
        Returns the name of the component that has been built
        Returns:
